comment: second step of three-step reaction (see R09578, R09579+R09580+R09581)
definition: N-Hydroxy-L-phenylalanine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N,N-Dihydroxy-L-phenylalanine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: N-hydroxy-L-phenylalanine,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
